name: Helper Bots!
description:
Helper Bots

This is a very Friendly and Competitive game played between 2-4 players and as a local multiplayer. Players use AI bots and completes the game levels. Game timer resets every 2 minutes and 30 seconds. Player who can score more points will be considered as a Victory. Scoring high points means collect as much boxes as possible and cross the roads and successfully deliver to the destination. Different boxes have different values. The details explanation of game concept will be like an image below. Game starts with either 2 or 4 players. All players are visible to each other. Players need to cross the road on either sides and carry crates and drop it to the destination to score points. Dropping Crates on half way or anywhere except destination will not score points. Hit by a Vehicle will loose points. Only use green light road to cross because you may get hit by vehicle if you walk on red light crossing road.
